sentences.en: The advert was trying to "show the ugliness of the illness, not of aids victims", he added.
sentences.cn: 他补充道，这则广告旨在“显示这个疾病的丑陋，而不是艾滋病患者本身。”

sentences.en: No doubt we will remember a 20th century way of life beyond comprehension for its ugliness.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，我们会记得20世纪的生活方式，其丑陋令人难以理解。

sentences.en: The jar may be empty or tenanted by spiders, full of honey or stinking slime—it makes no difference to its beauty or ugliness.
sentences.cn: 罐子可能是空的，也可能被蜘蛛租住，也可能装满了蜂蜜或恶臭的黏液，这对它的美丽或丑陋都没有影响。
